name: macOS (Ventura/Sonoma/Sequoia)
description: macOS virtual machine with OpenCore bootloader. Supports macOS Ventura (13), Sonoma (14), and Sequoia (15). Includes fixes for Sonoma/Sequoia boot issues (DmgLoading and ScanPolicy). Requires Intel CPU with AVX2 support (Haswell or newer) and KVM ignore_msrs enabled.

notes.text: Requires Intel CPU with AVX2 support (Haswell or newer). AMD CPUs are not supported.
After installation, copy the EFI folder from OpenCore to the main disk's EFI partition for standalone boot.
This script downloads OpenCore from thenickdude/KVM-Opencore and Apple recovery images from Apple servers.
